title: Elevator Not Working - Building A
description: The main elevator in Building A has been out of order since yesterday morning. It's causing major inconvenience, especially for elderly residents and those with heavy items. Please prioritize this repair as it's affecting daily life significantly.

title: Water Leakage in Basement Parking
description: There's significant water leakage in the basement parking area near slot B-15. The water has been accumulating for the past three days and is now affecting multiple parking spaces. It might be from the overhead water pipeline.

title: Broken Streetlight Near Gate 2
description: The streetlight near the secondary gate has been flickering for weeks and finally stopped working completely. This area becomes very dark in the evening, creating security concerns for residents walking through.

title: Garbage Collection Area Needs Attention
description: The main garbage collection area behind Building C has become very unhygienic. Waste is overflowing and there's a strong odor affecting nearby apartments. Regular cleaning schedule doesn't seem to be followed properly.

title: Security Guard Not Present at Night
description: Multiple residents have noticed that the security guard at the main gate is frequently absent during late night hours (11 PM - 3 AM). This is a serious security concern that needs immediate attention and proper monitoring.

title: Community Hall AC Not Cooling
description: The air conditioning in the community hall is not working properly. It's blowing warm air instead of cold. With upcoming events and meetings, this needs to be fixed urgently. The issue seems to be with the main unit.

title: Playground Equipment Safety Concern
description: Some of the swings in the children's playground have loose chains and the slide has a crack on the surface. These pose safety risks for children. Please inspect and repair immediately to prevent any accidents.

title: Intercom System Malfunction
description: The intercom system in my apartment (A-403) is not working. Visitors cannot call up and the security desk cannot reach me. This has been an issue for the past week and affects security protocol compliance.

title: Clogged Drain in Common Washroom
description: The drain in the common washroom near the gym is completely clogged. Water is backing up and creating unhygienic conditions. Multiple residents have complained about the smell and stagnant water.

title: Unauthorized Vehicle Parking
description: A non-resident vehicle with license plate MH-01-XX-1234 has been parked in visitor parking for over a week. It's taking up space meant for guests and violating parking rules. Security should tow or issue notice.
